meanings.definition: Pleasing the senses or mind aesthetically
meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden looked beautiful in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The painting was so beautiful that it made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in beautiful hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the song was as beautiful as a gentle breeze on a summer day.

meanings.definition: Of a very high standard; excellent
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a beautiful dish that impressed all the guests.
meanings.sent2: The team put up a beautiful performance that won them the championship.
meanings.sent3: The plan was executed so beautifully that it seemed effortless.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was a beautiful display of eloquence and passion.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the sculpture showcased the artist's beautiful craftsmanship.

meanings.sent1: The aroma of freshly baked cookies was a beautiful welcome.
meanings.sent2: The movie had a beautiful storyline that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected plot twist was a beautiful surprise for the viewers.
meanings.sent4: The laughter of children playing together was a beautiful sound.
meanings.sent5: The view from the mountaintop was so beautiful that it took her breath away.
